conversations.body_text: Hi Rob Giorgio,    Have they not contacted you? You can reach out to them to confirm the delivery time. Call 1-800-282-2468.  Your tracking number: UUS5BD0560310985683   https://t.17track.net/en#nums=UUS5BD0560310985683

I have been in touch with their customer service bots and still can not get
an answer to my question.  The question is what day and time will the
package be delivered?  All I get in the next 24 to 48 hrs someone will be
in touch or it will be delivered.  That is not answering my question.

A question to your company: why are you using a delivery service that tries
to deliver packages after hours of a business and on a Sunday when a
business is closed?  Why don't you use a more professional service?   This
experience is not going to make me think "why should I buy from these guys
again when they are using this less than professional service"?


Rob Giorgio

Giorgio Technology Sales/Service

480-917-3640- Office

480-917-6571 - Fax

rob@gtsaz.com <jt@gtsaz.com>

www.gtsaz.com

Hi Rob Giorgio,     You may first call 1-800-282-2468 to arrange for pickup. We are currently investigating the cause of the discrepancy.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=UUS5BD0560310985683
Hi Rob Giorgio,    I noticed the logistics company attempted delivery three times but failed each time. Please contact them at 1-800-282-2468.   https://t.17track.net/en#nums=UUS5BD0560310985683

I have tried that number and the message is it is not in service.

About the 3 times of delivery.

When I ordered this item I informed your company of my business hrs.
Monday through Friday 8am to 4pm.
1st attempt was after hrs.
2nd attempt was on a Sunday. Business was closed.
3rd attempt on a holiday.

The bottom line is your company looks like fools using an unprofessional
company who tries to deliver after hrs/weekends/holidays and whose customer
service phone number does not work.

Now my question is what are you going to do?

Rob Giorgio

Giorgio Technology Sales/Service

480-917-3640- Office

480-917-6571 - Fax

rob@gtsaz.com <jt@gtsaz.com>

      主题: Fwd: A shipment from order #SSN3407 is on the way

Hi Rob Giorgio,     Due to a delay in the latest restocking at our warehouse, the processing of your order has been affected. We are expediting your shipment, and we kindly ask for a bit more patience. Thank you very much for your understanding and support.
Hi Rob Giorgio,    We have contacted the logistics provider. If they are unable to provide a timely solution, we will promptly arrange for a replacement shipment from our U.S. warehouse.
Hi Rob Giorgio,    We have informed the courier of your preferred time slot and hope everything goes smoothly.
